ygData.subject: Re: Kunark questions
ygData.msgSnippet: I don t know if I made it clear earlier but Evil Races should use the Oasis raft BUT Good races should use the Butcherblock rafts. This is important
ygData.messageBody:
I don't know if I made it clear earlier but Evil
Races should use the Oasis raft BUT Good races should
use the Butcherblock rafts. <br><br>This is important
b/c then you don't need to worry about KOS. Another
reason this is important is b/c then you have a city to
bind in. If you die there.. you won't have to worry
about making the trip again. Just make sure to go get a
bind.<br><br>OT has a city I believe for evil races (never been
there myself) for binds, and FV I know has a nice city
with a bank and all sorts of goods, great place for
Kunark binds. =)<br><br>Wanted to make that clear. FV is
rough though... lots of big npc's and you want to try
following the lake edge to the river... and the river up
the waterfall till you can get to the Lake of Ill
Omen.<br><br>shooman out
